tagline: IT Support for Creative Companies and Departments
description: In an industry so focused on “thinking outside the box”, why does IT and the technical needs of highly creative companies become just an afterthought? With over 10 years of experience, and the flexibility of being independent, I can help where “the big boys” can't, whether it’s non-linear 4k editing workstations, cloud based render farms, or simply setting up a high speed internal network: I can help.
